Thanks

Describe your issue: Hi, I am working remotely and using NetScaler Gateway to access my work desktop at home. I use Canva for work but the autosave funtion isn't working. It just says 'connecting...'. It also says the same within the file>save function. I am using up to date Chrome.
I don't have any issues using chrome on my personal account when not using my computer to work remotely. Is it a connection issue? Do you have any resolutions please?

Many thanks

Describe your issue: I was working on a project in Canva, I am using an up to date browser and my internet connection has been stable the entire time. However, when I went to download I couldn't and I realized no of my changes were being saved. Instead of saying "changes saved" my page said "saving paused," but I never paused saving. Furthermore, when I tried to manually save my changes by going to <NAME> and selecting "save," nothing happened and I still had all of the problems listed above. I've tried multiple times to no avail, and I worry that if I shut down my computer or restart, all my progress will be lost. I have no idea how this problem occurred, can you help?

Describe your issue: None of my graphics are downloading into pptx or google slides. I have tried manually saving, using a different browser, deleting browser history, and have made sure my internet connection is stable. I have been using workarounds, but being able to just download my designs would make my life so much easier!
